column3: I guess you'd have to cherry-pick the fixup to contrib/check-doc as well.
I added a commit for the check-doc fix.
utACK 3ea4d90.\n\nPlease squash otherwise `check-doc.py` fails for 1st commit.
utACK dadad0d559f62ff7d9752655dc4bbb922e97423d\n\nI did not review all the command line help/AddArg statements, but I did compare the output of `-help` and `-help -help-debug` before and after.
Concept ACK, makes sense to split this out
Code review and lightly tested ACK 4d4185a4f0e40c033a587871839a47cb3f89ee93
I believe this can be marked const.
Code style nit: use braces when putting then/else branches on separate lines.
